regen.absent_element: consideration for clearing or saving data on closing the application
regen.new_specification: The system shall prompt the user to either save changes or discard them before the application closes, ensuring all intentional user actions are confirmed.

regen.absent_element: action for data clearing or retention after the close button is clicked
regen.new_specification: The system shall retain or clear all entered data based on user settings or confirmation after the Close button is clicked.

regen.absent_element: prompt for unsaved changes when close button is clicked
regen.new_specification: The system shall prompt the user to save any unsaved changes with a warning message when the close button is clicked.

label: The system shall direct the user to the xxx Page if the user chooses to click the close button without entering any data.
absence: situation of clicking the close button
